1.2.0.name: wordpress/vietnamese-permalink
1.2.0.description:
Make you Permalink friendly: no space, no accents, no dot, no @... and reset your Permalink if you want


Tao permalink dep cho tieng Viet, giup bo qua cac loi hay gap trong tieng Viet bang cach chuyen toan bo link ve dang khong dau. Truy cap dien dan SEO de biet them chi tiet.
